dataModel.description: Type of evidence visible on treated target animals
dataModel.name: evidenceOfPreviousPestTreatment
constraints: Harbours, burrows or nests present but empty
Re-appearance / increased populations of food species present
Reduced / eradicated population of pest species present

dataModel.description: The effectiveness of the last treatment activity as a proportion of the area and density of the infestation that existed before the previous treatment activity, expressed as the number of individuals killed / removed from the population
dataModel.name: effectivenessOfPreviousWeedTreatment

dataModel.description: The method used to assess the effectiveness of previous pest animal treatment. 'NB.: This pertains to evidence of previous treatments only.'
dataModel.name: previousPestTreatmentAssessmentMethod
constraints: Measurable change in evidence / signs of presence
Measurable change in trapping success rate
Method-based population survey - food species abundance (specify method in notes)
Method-based population survey - target species abundance (specify method in notes)

dataModel.description: The type of treatment method recommended for initial or follow up treatment
dataModel.name: recommendedPestTreatment
constraints: Exclusion fencing (please specify fence details in a separate 'Fencing' activity)

dataModel.description: General observational notes applicable to the site, treatment, conditions, etc.
dataModel.name: notes

items.preLabel: Recommended initial or follow-up treatment method:

items.source: 'NB.: The following methods pertain only to how evidence of previous treatments was obtained.'
